com.github.fge.jackson

Class JsonNumEquals

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.base.Equivalence<JsonNode>
      • com.github.fge.jackson.JsonNumEquals

  • public final class JsonNumEquals
extends com.google.common.base.Equivalence<JsonNode>
    An Equivalence strategy for JSON Schema equality

    JsonNode does a pretty good job of obeying the equals()/hashCode() contract. And in fact, it does it too well for JSON Schema.

    For instance, it considers numeric nodes 1 and 1.0 to be different nodes, which is true. But JSON Schema mandates that numeric JSON values are equal if their mathematical value is the same. This class enforces this kind of equality.
